book.description: Private detective Cormoran Strike investigates the death of a famous supermodel in this debut novel by J.K. Rowling's pseudonym.

book.title: Angels and Demons
book.author: Dan Brown
book.description: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is called in to help when the Illuminati threaten to destroy the Vatican in this fast-paced thriller.

book.title: Three Cups of Tea
book.author: Greg Mortenson, David Oliver Relin
book.description: Greg Mortenson's mission to build schools in Pakistan and Afghanistan and promote education for girls is chronicled in this inspiring memoir.

book.title: White Teeth
book.author: Zadie Smith
book.description: Two friends, one white and one black, navigate their identities and family histories in multicultural London in this acclaimed debut novel.

book.title: The Night Circus
book.author: Erin Morgenstern
book.description: Two young magicians compete in a mysterious circus that appears without warning and disappears just as suddenly in this enchanting and imaginative novel.

book.title: Beloved
book.author: Toni Morrison
book.description: Sethe, a former slave haunted by her past, is visited by the ghost of her dead daughter in this powerful and haunting novel about the legacy of slavery.

book.title: A Game of Thrones
book.author: George R.R. Martin
book.description: The first book in the epic fantasy series A Song of Ice and Fire, which follows the struggles of several noble houses as they fight for control of the Seven Kingdoms.

book.title: The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle
book.author: Haruki Murakami
book.description: A man's search for his missing wife leads him on a surreal and mysterious journey through Tokyo in this critically acclaimed novel.

book.title: The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao
book.author: Junot Diaz
book.description: A Dominican-American nerd named Oscar dreams of becoming a writer while struggling with his family's past in this Pulitzer Prize-winning novel.

book.title: The Color Purple
book.author: Alice Walker
book.description: Celie, a poor and uneducated African-American woman, finds her voice and identity with the help of her sister and other women in this powerful and inspiring novel.

book.title: The Name of the Wind
book.author: Patrick Rothfuss
book.description: A talented young wizard named Kvothe tells the story of his life and adventures in this enthralling and beautifully written fantasy novel.

book.title: The Kite Runner
book.author: Khaled Hosseini
book.description: Afghanistan in the 1970s and 80s is the setting for this poignant and unforgettable novel about friendship, betrayal, and redemption.

book.title: Life of Pi
book.author: Yann Martel
book.description: A young Indian boy named Pi survives a shipwreck and spends months on a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger in this extraordinary and captivating novel.

book.title: The Road
book.author: Cormac McCarthy
book.description: A man and his young son journey through a desolate and dangerous world in search of safety and hope in this haunting and powerful novel.

book.title: The Amazing Adventures of Kavalier and Clay
book.author: Michael Chabon
book.description: A Jewish artist and a Czech escape artist team up to create a comic book superhero and find success and love in this exuberant and heartfelt novel.

book.title: The Da Vinci Code
book.author: Dan Brown
book.description: When a respected curator is murdered at the Louvre, a symbologist and a cryptographer follow clues that lead to a secret society and a shocking revelation in this fast-paced and controversial thriller.

book.author: Yuval Noah Harari
book.description: An overview of human history, from the emergence of Homo sapiens to the present day.

book.author: Charlotte Bronte
book.description: A young governess falls in love with her employer, Mr. Rochester, but soon discovers his dark secret.

book.description: A memoir of the author's childhood in poverty-stricken Ireland.

book.author: Oscar Wilde

book.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
